tasks.label: Сбросить (j-link)
args: ((echo device ${config:device} & echo si jtag & echo speed 4000 & echo r & echo h & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (JLink.exe -jtagconf -1,-1 -autoconnect 1 -nogui 1 -CommandFile flash.jlink) 1> nul && echo "Успешно" || echo "Ошибка"

tasks.label: Очистить всё (j-link)
args: ((echo r & echo h & echo erase & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (JLink.exe -device ${config:device} -if jtag -speed 4000 -jtagconf -1,-1 -autoconnect 1 -nogui 1 -CommandFile flash.jlink) 1> nul && echo "Успешно" || echo "Ошибка"

tasks.label: Прошить (j-link)
args: ((echo r & echo h & echo loadfile ${command:cmake.buildType}/${workspaceFolderBasename}.hex & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (JLink.exe -device ${config:device} -if jtag -speed 4000 -jtagconf -1,-1 -autoconnect 1 -nogui 1 -CommandFile flash.jlink) 1> nul && echo "Успешно" || echo "Ошибка"
